argument.name: expression
argument.description: A filter expression that selects elements in an array.

page.description: Returns a CR-LF delimited list of indices of array elements that match a filter.
page.discussion: The <ARRAY>.MATCHING() methods returns a CR-LF delimited list of elements from a single dimensional array that match a filter.

section.title: Example
section.example:
dim p[10] as P p[1].fname="Selwyn" p[1].lname="Rabins" p[2].fname="Lenny" p[2].lname="Forziati" p[3].fname="Cian" p[3].lname="Chambliss" p[4].fname="Richard" p[4].lname="Rabins"
dim names as c for each elem in p.matching("lname=\"Rabins\"") dim ptr as p = eval("p"+elem) names = names + ptr.fname+" "+ptr.lname + crlf() next
? names = Selwyn Rabins Richard Rabins
section.note: The output includes the square brackets around each index
